tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had fever i was in office, I was suffering from headache,
I just wanted to recover as soon as I possible because i was suffering high headache, I booked appointment for 5pm on the same day , even i requested to go before 5pm , but may be doctor was busy,, that was ok 
I waited for 5 pm 
I went there , doctor behavior so nice, after coming back i took medicine *** ** ***** *** ********** ***** *** ** ********** **** ****** ********* **** * **** ** ****** ** *********** *** **** ***** ******* ***** * *** *** *** *** ********** **** * **** ********* Really that very disappointed thing.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was really helpful during this covid time. he gave a good advice and medication for covid mild symptoms. We needed urgent assistance from doctor and Dr. Walia did not hesitate to take out his time and advised us which reduced the tension. He himself had called and quickly answered questions raised after consultation as well.I will highly recommend him as it is rare to find such a great human being and such great doctor who actually thinks for betterment of patients.Thank you so much again doctor for your quick advice and help. We are grateful to you always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Walia is a very experienced and an excellent doctor, he diagnosed the illness as typhoid when other doctors diagnosed it as normal viral fever, all his medicines were very appropriate and highly affective in the recovery process. Thankyou so much sir for your timely diagnosis, lots of regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience of consulting Dr. Walia was extremely pleasant. Dr. Walia heard me out and very thoroughly explained me. Making the patient comfortable is very important and Dr. Walia did that extremely well. He is to the point, warm and a very assuring Doctor. I wish him well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Spends time with the patient. Checks for their well being and gathers info on complete history before prescribing medicines. He's one of the few doctors who listen to the patient. I think that resolves half the issue there itself. would highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor is extremely ************* *** helpful. Listens to your queries and concerns in detail and resolves them patiently.But above all, he is very concerned. Called himself to answer queries and never once did we feel that he is too busy to hear out.Thanks a lot doc!

Hi, With due respect for a sensior Doctor Mr K.S. Walia, I was highly un satisfied with his consultation. I am suffering from 104+ fever since 3 days and my dengue rapid was positive but antigen was negative. Now when I consulated Mr Walia. ** ***** ** ****** *************** ** ** ******** He was way casual in his words.  Since the current lab tests couldnot give any clue. I asked shall I do any another test, to my surprise he said 'No'. I said when do I come back for followup. To that he replied 'No need for a followup'. I asked is there any food related suggestions he simply said 'Nothing' . ** ******* *** ******* ******** **** **** ** **** ** * ******* ***** *********** * 

Won't tell you to not visit but I will not visit him again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Walia with constant cough, fever and stomach pain and after he recommended few tests and Chest xray the cause of it was diagnosed by Dr Walia. He recommended medicines to be taken for a fortnight after which i had to visit him for a review. My condition started improving after few days of the medicines he recommended and now i have to complete the full course of the medicine to return to normal self. 

Thanks for the right treatment provided to me by Dr walia as i was suffering for more than a year with the same condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had the distinct pleasure of being on the receiving end of his genuine care for my wellbeing through listening to what I have to say and approaching an issue in what feels like a collaborative way. I trust what he has to say in part because he seems so open minded and not rigid in his thinking or approach. I can't say enough good things about him and am not at all surprised to see all the positive reviews. A big reason for wanting to write this review is hoping that he will see it one day and know the appreciation of his patients.

reply_text: Thank you for your Valuable Feedback. Wish you good Health Always.

review: Refused to listen to my issue. Dismissed my complaints and were generally uncooperative. If they didn't want to see me, I would have been fine if they just said it.
reply_text:
I appreciate that you visited us for pain in the shoulder area.
Following our check up , we advised to get X-ray done for future evaluation and prescribed medicine for pain relief. 
Per our preliminary investigation, it seemed that the stiffness is due to long desk work hours which requires  reassessment of work ergonomics.

We strive to deliver the best care possible to all of our patients, even if that means giving considerable consultation time.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: No proper prescription was shared with me. The doctor just ranted off the names of some meds and then clicked a pic of the prescription from his notepad and shared with me and there was nothing in the diagnosis section there, also all my complaints were not written. Also, the consultation was not a video call as was promised to me. I got a voice call from the doc and had to explain the issues on the call.
reply_text:
“Thank you for your feedback.
I would like to address the issue that you brought forth. 
We are committed to attending to our patients timely and so if the patient appears offline, we take audio call, like done in this case. 
The discussion was followed by a proper prescription with diagnosis and medication, sent through Practo.
We also offer patients the ability to do call or send message free of cost within 7 days that we’d like you to use for any follow up questions.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: After seeing two other doctors, I found Dr. Walia to be the kind of doctor you wish all doctors could be. He is wonderful, caring, extremely courteous & treats you in a very professional way. He never rushes you out and you can actually talk to him. I just want to say that your good hard work is very appreciated. My Sugar was uncontrollable for sometime now and after Dr Walia's treatment its well within the permissible limits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

He also, gives his patients really excellent advice when you need it. There is no complains about Dr. Walia! Keep up the good work Dr. Your the best doctor ever!!!!!!!!

review: Dr. is too much cooperative.  His behaviour is friendly. There was network issue in my home. Doctor tried continuously to connect me even I was unable to pick up his phone. Doctor  gave his time about 1hour 30 minutes.  I think any other doctor would neglect me in such network issue. Dr. listened me politely with patience. His behaviour towards patients is extra ordinary. Next day, Dr. also called me and asked the patient condition and suggested me .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: In the trying times of Corona, we sought video consultation by Doctor Wadia. Even though it was really difficult to analyze internal pain on a brief video chat but the doctor was very helpful and tried to understand the issue. We are really satisfied. He was readily available for any queries and was very patient. Thankful to have contacted him via practo.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:

Tells you to take few relevant tests based on probable diagnosis.

I was satisfied with my first interaction with him

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ***** * **** ****** **** **** **** he is thorough and thoughtful and always wants to help you think through what they best care for your circumstance would be. You never feel like he is rushing through the appointment and he always follows up when he says he will.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a bad lung infection and had difficult breathing; Dr. Walia immediately knew what was wrong once he examined me, and went on to prescribe medications, starting with low doses and gradually increasing if the response was not satisfactory after a week.  He was very pleasant, courteous and patient, again hard to come by where doctors spend less and less time with patients in order to see more patients in a day. He is thorough and concerned. Highly recomend him, one of the best G.P.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Trust him implicitly. Great judgement and common sense, does not overdiagnose or over prescribe. Seems to be intent on getting as quickly as possible to the right conclusion and solution. Knows his limitations but does not refer to specialists unless absolutely necessary.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Extremely pleasant doctor. Would visit him in future too for consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

So truly grateful, thank you Dr Walia!!!

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!.
